name: GloboTech Corporation
overview:
By2Clicks Investment Group LLC was launched in 2000 as a leading Canadian internet investment company. Since then, we have been growing quickly. We currently have more than 180 employees and participate in markets around the world, including Canada, the United States, the UK, Australia and New Zealand. Our company is dedicated to finding new ways to capitalize on new and efficient investment products and services.

There will always be newly emerging investment products in the investment and banking industry, and therefore the chance to improve existing and new products and aggressively profit from them. Despite the ever changing investment industry we are a company committed to high values and outstanding ethical conduct.
